alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 10:15PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WITH GUSTY WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN PIKE AND SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EST... At 1013 PM EST, showers were located along a line extending from Rarden to Vanceburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Wheelersburg, New Boston, South Webster, Head of Grassy, Rosemount, Clarktown, Camp Dix, Lucasville, Franklin Furnace, Sciotodale, Beaver, Otway, Wakefield, Saint Paul, Minford, Friendship, Mcdermott, Mount Joy and Bear Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
